data.title: The Long Ryders
data.meta_description: The Long Ryders - Ivory Tower (Letra y canción para escuchar) - My friend lives in an ivory tower / She's protected from misery / She doesn't worry she's got power / She controls all she sees / But her blinders work too
data.text:
My friend lives in an ivory tower

She's protected from misery

She doesn't worry she's got power

She controls all she sees

But her blinders work too well

She don't listen when you try to tell her

It's too late

Your ivory tower's falling down

She strolls down the rose lined lane

With her thoughts up in the air

And she never has known pain

Yet she still insists she cares

But her blinders work too well

She don't listen when you try to tell her

It's too late

Your ivory tower's falling down

Still you got to be careful

What you say to her

Still you got to be careful

What you say

My friend lives in an ivory tower

She's protected from misery

She doesn't worry she's got power

She controls all she sees
